item.title: Some Social Reworks Version 2 Done
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Mystic and Illusionist

The Mystic, BD, Social

Passive 1: Mind Of Strength: Immune to Chill, Trollbox, Distract, and Bewilder, will still be there even if you’re class changes

Day Ability 1: Telepathy: Same

Day Ability 2: Magical Orb: orb a player discovering what happens to them at night (note: it will only show things that have messages like “someone occupied you” not things like someone investigated you), 3 use

Night Ability 1: Link Minds: Same

Night Ability 2: Conduit: same

The Illusionist, Unseen, Social

Passive 1: Mind Of Strength: Same as said before

Day Ability 1: Telepathy: Same

Day Ability 2: Mind Writer: Write in a player’s logs, if they die their logs will appear as what you have made, 2 use

Night Ability 1: Link Minds: Same

Night Ability 2: Conduit: same

Noble and Aristocrat

The Noble, BD, Social

Passive 1: Royal Blood: Same

Passive 2: Privacy: for the first 3 days you’re whispers will be hidden from all players

Day Ability 1: Innocent Friend: Mark a player as an innocent player this will make them unvoteable for the day, 2 use, 2 day recharge time

Day Ability 2: Political Pressure: Make a person vote for another person, this person can’t vote again for the day

Night Ability 1: Maid Spy: Same

Night Ability 2: Snoop Alert: same as snoop but alerts the target that his logs have been snooped (idea by Vandalay)

The Aristocrat, Unseen, Social

Passive 1: Royal blood: same

Passive 2: Privacy: same

Day Ability 1: Dear Friend: same as innocent friend

Day Ability 2: Political Pressure: same

Night Ability 1: Unseen Spy: same as maid spy

Night Ability 2: Alert Snoop: same

Apostle

The Apostle, Cult, Social

Passive 1: Privacy: same

Day Ability 1: Telepathy: same

Day Ability 2: Cult Pressure: same

Night Ability 1: Cult Spy: same

Night Ability 2: Crazy Writer: forge a player’s logs making you’re copy be seen after he dies, it will say that the same message said by snoop alert to you’re target

Feedback/suggestions are always appreciated! Also if there is something you don’t like, please tell me it! I would be very happy to hear about it!
